mapper.update:
update channel_diagnose_tool
device_id = #{deviceId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
channel_info_id = #{channelInfoId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
command = #{command,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
params = #{params,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
work_area = #{workArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
iface_id = #{ifaceId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
exec_state = #{execState,jdbcType=TINYINT},
gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update channel_diagnose_tool set device_id = #{deviceId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, channel_info_id = #{channelInfoId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, command = #{command,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, params = #{params,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, work_area = #{workArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, iface_id = #{ifaceId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, exec_state = #{execState,jdbcType=TINYINT}, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(gmt_create, '%Y-%m-%d %T') AS gmt_create FROM channel_diagnose_tool ORDER BY gmt_create DESC LIMIT ${oldLimit},1
